general.description:
This lush world on the border of Read Quadrant League and Thirteen Planets, originately settled by Pupeteers, has developed a multi-species colony with a Spacer-inspired culture. Its good if not excellent biocompatibility and the existence of many species well suited to become bearers earned it fame quite early.
It is a favorite among Spacers as a haven of peace, as it willingly removed itself from the turmoil of interstellar politics. It is also known as a quite active local trade hub.
general.bar: A diverse crowd of Spacers from all the known universe, no species, state of origin or culture is absent in Svenia's numerous bars
